EmailTemplate.name: Hunger Walk-Run Drip.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Calling all Atlanta-based customers!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Friend}},
Get those sneakers out! The 2020 Hunger Walk-Run benefiting the Atlanta Community Food Bank is on March 15, and we would love for you to participate with Team NCR. All ages are welcome – runners or walkers, too. Simply complete the registration form (at no cost) and we'll handle the rest.
We are excited about this event and hope you will join us for this fun, meaningful event that makes a positive impact on our community. Reserve your spot today! What? 2020 Hunger Walk-Run
When? Sunday, March 15 12:00pm – 4:00pm (registration and entertainment begins at 12:00pm)
Where? The Home Depot Backyard at Mercedes-Benz Stadium ${Button-Text} <[[${Button-Link}]]> Please do not forward this exclusive invite. NCR Corporation 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 © 2020 Copyright NCR Unsubscribe <[[https://go.ncr.com/UnsubscribePage.html?mkt_unsubscribe=1&mkt_tok=]]> learn more <[[https://www.ncr.com]]>
